hero.title: MannSafar
hero.subtitle: Discover personalized tools and insights to support your emotional well-being

lovydubby.title: LovyDubby
lovydubby.description: Real 3D model of a person integrated with human brain to respond as per the users' queries to provide realistic presence and natural interaction.

aiCompanion.title: AI Companion
aiCompanion.description: Chat with your empathetic AI companion anytime. Get support, guidance, and a listening ear whenever you need it most.

journal.title: Personal Journal
journal.description: Express your thoughts, feelings, and experiences in a private, secure space. Track your emotional patterns and personal growth over time.

games.title: Emotion Games
games.description: Engage in fun and therapeutic games designed to help you identify, understand, and manage your emotions in a playful way.

progress.title: Progress Tracker
progress.description: Monitor your wellness journey with detailed analytics, mood trends, and personalized insights to help you understand your growth.

quotes.text: The greatest revolution of our generation is the discovery that human beings, by changing the inner attitudes of their minds, can change the outer aspects of their lives.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.text: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: Do not anticipate trouble, or worry about what may never happen. Keep in the sunlight.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Every day may not be good, but there’s something good in every day.
quotes.author: Alice Morse Earle

about.title: About MannSafar
about.subtitle: Leading the future of mental wellness with AI-powered tools and compassionate care
about.users_desc: Trusted by millions worldwide for their mental wellness journey
about.award_desc: Recognized by leading healthcare organizations for innovation
about.secure_desc: Your data is protected with enterprise-grade security and privacy
about.mission_desc: At MannSafar, we believe everyone deserves access to quality mental health support. Our AI-powered platform combines cutting-edge technology with evidence-based therapeutic approaches to provide personalized wellness solutions that fit into your daily life.

beginJourney.subtitle: Choose how you’d like to share your feelings today.

moodInput.title: How are you feeling right now?

lovyDubbyPage.title: LovyDubby
lovyDubbyPage.excitement: Are you as super excited as we are?
lovyDubbyPage.description: Something incredible is taking shape behind the scenes — a lifelike 3D model with smooth, natural interaction. Get ready to meet LovyDubby soon… stay tuned!

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Control how and when you receive notifications
notifications.dailyRemindersDesc: Get daily prompts for journaling and mood tracking
notifications.weeklyReportsDesc: Receive weekly insights about your wellness journey
notifications.moodAlertsDesc: Get notified when patterns in your mood are detected
notifications.journalPromptsDesc: Receive inspiring prompts for your journal entries

appearance.title: Appearance & Preferences
appearance.description: Customize the look and feel of your app

privacy.title: Privacy & Data
privacy.description: Control your data and privacy settings
privacy.dataSharingDesc: Help improve wellness tools with anonymized data
privacy.analyticsDesc: Help us improve the app experience
privacy.publicProfileDesc: Make your wellness achievements visible to others

dataManagement.title: Data Management
dataManagement.description: Export, import, or delete your wellness data
dataManagement.exportDataDesc: Download all your wellness data in JSON format

accountActions.title: Account Actions
accountActions.signOutDesc: Sign out of your current session
accountActions.deleteAccountDesc: Permanently delete your account and all data

toasts.signOutSuccessDesc: Come back soon for your wellness journey!
toasts.exportInitDesc: You'll receive an email with your data within 24 hours.
toasts.deleteAccountDesc: This feature is not available yet. Contact support for assistance.

profilePage.title: Profile Settings
profilePage.cardDescription: Update your profile details and preferences
profilePage.avatarRequirements: JPG, PNG or GIF. Max size 5MB.
profilePage.emailDescription: Email cannot be changed here. Contact support if needed.

static.title: Your Assessment
static.invalidEmotion: Invalid emotion selected. Please go back.

toasts.selectOption: Please select an option to continue.
toasts.mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to save your assessment.
toasts.saveError: Failed to save assessment. Please try again.

progressTracker.title: Progress Tracker
progressTracker.subtitle: Monitor your wellness journey with detailed analytics and insights.

moodSwing.title: Sudden Mood Swing Detected
moodSwing.description: Your recent mood entries show a significant change. Here are some actions you can take:

charts.dailyTrendDescription: Your mood ratings for all entries
charts.weeklyTrendDescription: Most frequent mood for each of the last 7 days
charts.reasonsDescription: Why you've felt a certain way recently.
charts.heatmapDescription: Your primary emotion for each day.

toasts.comingSoonDescription: We're working on it. Stay tuned for updates.

aiCompanion.title: AI Companion
aiCompanion.pageDescription: Your empathetic AI companion is here to listen and provide support.

chat.title: Conversation
chat.description: Share your thoughts and feelings in a safe space
chat.initialMessage: Hello! I'm here to listen and support you. How are you feeling today?

entries.title: Your Entries
entries.noEntries: No journal entries yet. Start writing your first entry!

editor.title: Write Your Thoughts
editor.description: Express yourself in a private, secure space
editor.contentPlaceholder: How are you feeling today? What's on your mind?

happy.name: Happy 🎈
happy.title: Balloon Pop 🎈
happy.instructions: Tap balloons to pop them 🎉 Every pop adds to your score and is saved in your progress.

sad.name: Sad ☔
sad.description: Catch raindrops and brighten the sky.
sad.title: Raindrop Catch ☔
sad.instructions: Move the bucket with ⬅️ ➡️ keys to catch the raindrops. Missed drops: {{missed}}/{{DROP_LIMIT}}. Catch them to lift your mood and increase your score 🌈.

demotivated.name: Demotivated 🪜
demotivated.description: Climb steps and get little wins.
demotivated.title: Step Climber 🪜
demotivated.instructions: Press SPACE to climb each step. If timing is off, you may slip! Reach higher and see motivational messages appear.
motivationalMessages: You are stronger than you think!

angry.name: Angry 💥
angry.description: Smash bubbles to release the fire.
angry.title: Bubble Smash & Breathe 💥
angry.instructions: Smash bubbles rhythmically and earn calm points. Every so often, take a break to breathe deeply and calm your mind.

breathingModal.title: Breathing Break
breathingModal.instructions: Take a deep breath in... and out... (Repeat 5 times)

carefree.name: Carefree ☁️
carefree.title: Cloud Painter ☁️🎨
carefree.instructions: Drag and paint clouds across the sky. Colors change as you paint and there’s no limit – relax and enjoy! ☁️✨

tensed.name: Tensed 🌸
tensed.description: Follow the breathing circle & calm down.
tensed.title: Breathing Circle 🌸
tensed.instructions: Follow the circle’s rhythm. Inhale as it grows, exhale as it shrinks. Each full cycle calms your mind and adds to your progress ✨.

curious.name: Curious ✨
curious.title: Knowledge Explorer ✨
curious.congratsMessage: On learning so much today! Click to return to dashboard.
curious.instructions: Click on any star to reveal interesting facts. Each discovery expands your knowledge and fills your starry sky! 🌌

facts.fact_3: Your stomach gets a new lining every 3–4 days 🫀
facts.fact_5: Sloths can hold their breath longer than dolphins 🦥
facts.fact_6: A day on Venus is longer than a year on Venus 🌌
facts.fact_8: There are more stars in space than grains of sand on Earth ✨
facts.fact_9: Koalas have fingerprints almost identical to humans 🐨
facts.fact_10: Water can boil and freeze at the same time 🌡️
facts.fact_11: Sea otters hold hands while they sleep 🦦
facts.fact_12: Banana plants are herbs, not trees 🌱
facts.fact_13: The heart of a blue whale is the size of a car 🚙
facts.fact_15: The Eiffel Tower grows taller in summer ☀️
facts.fact_16: A group of flamingos is called a flamboyance 🦩
facts.fact_17: Your bones are stronger than steel 🦴
facts.fact_18: Some turtles can breathe through their butts 🐢
facts.fact_19: Cows have best friends and get stressed when separated 🐄
